title: How to Create Vertical Text in GIMP | Text Tool Basics

media:group.media:title: How to Create Vertical Text in GIMP | Text Tool Basics
media:group.media:description:
In this GIMP text tool tutorial, I show you how to add vertical text to your image or composition using GIMP! This is super easy to do and can help you create great text effects, or simply help those of you who write in languages with vertical text.

This tutorial was made for beginners, but can also be helpful for those of you experienced with GIMP or the text tool.

0:00 - Intro & Resources
0:39 - Create a New Image & Add Text
1:42 - Set Vertical Text Orientation
2:52 - Customize Vertical Text
3:19 - Center Your Vertical Text
3:54 - Final Thoughts
